May 17, 1997 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
Three Figures
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - soprano - Cory. Best horn - Cwmaman. 5 bands competed.
Feb. 27, 2011, 12:33 a.m. June 30, 2020, 10:51 p.m.
1 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Nigel Seaman
3 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band John Hudson
Unknown Result Tongwynlais Temperance Band Bernard Williams
